scripts.clean: rm -rdf build && mkdir -p build/js && rm -rdf lib && mkdir -p lib/js && mkdir -p lib/css
scripts.build: npm run build:css -s && npm run build:js -s && npm run build:images
scripts.build:css: echo '>> compiling css..' && node-sass -s --include-path src/scss src/scss/app.scss build/css/app.css
scripts.build:js: cp node_modules/bootstrap-sass/assets/javascripts/bootstrap.min.js lib/js && cp node_modules/leaflet/dist/leaflet.js lib/js && cp src/js/app.js build/js
scripts.minify: npm run minify:js -s && npm run minify:css -s
scripts.package: npm run build -s && npm run minify -s
scripts.watch: nodemon -x 'npm run build && npm run minify' -e scss,js,html -w src
scripts.local: npm run watch -s & npm run serve -s & npm run reload -s
